title: Mary And The Scary Cloud
description: How do we overcome fear?Mary fears a dark cloud on the way to the chocolate hill. The kids mock her so she turns to the animals for advice, each one of them suggests its own unique tactic to deal with fear. A smart and witty book about overcoming fears and fulfilling dreams (symbolized by chocolate). Enjoyable for children and inspiring for adults. Engaging rhymes and captivating real hand-made illustrations.
author: Ayelet Mor
